created_at: $ZIM largest shareholders - $KEN and $DAC are in the same boat we are but with a lot more shares.  How pissed are they that $ZIM declared this large dividend?  Their dividends are subject to Israel dividend taxes too.  They don't get the foreign tax credit refund.  The dividends are also taxable income to these companies.  Their shares in ZIM will experience the same price fluctuations as ours post ex-div date?  Shouldn't they be absolutely pissed off at ZIM?!?!?
